content: alison s hat recipe is the go-to resource you ll always want to have on hand this versatile recipe-style pattern gives you options for different ribbings and slouch factors as well as being easily adjustable to any gauge grab a yarn you can t wait to knit with and cast on a hat for yourself or anyone on your knitworthy list samples shown in the following yarns berroco merino 401 50 g 2 balls #11274 teal 20 sts and 26 row = 4 / 10 cm on size 7 / 4 5 mm berroco hearthside 100 g 1 ball #11009 ebony 15 5 sts and 21 row = 4 / 10 cm on size 10 5 / 6 5 mm berroco gimlet 50 g 2 balls #10721 mojito 14 sts and 21 rnds = 4 / 10 cm on size 10 / 6 mm berroco carousel 100 g 1 ball #4465 leap frog 27 sts and 36 rnds = 4 / 10 cm on size 4 / 3 5 mm finished measurements *berroco merino 401 * 19¼ unstretched circumference to fit 20¾ 21¾ head *berroco hearthside * 19½ unstretched circumference to fit 21 22 head *berroco gimlet * 20½ unstretched circumference to fit 22 23 head *berroco carousel * 17¾ unstretched circumference to fit 19¼ 20¼ head
